topics.body:
"@QuasarNova":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/558880f8636872740a000118#post_558880f8636872740a000118
Pretty much.  It would be a very difficult problem to cure unfortunately.  They would literally have to be isolated from any potential network which would for obvious reasons not go well with them.  Even if it's not even 1% of the population there would definitely have to be specialized care centers for addicts cause you would have to completely isolate them from any means of escape.

Basically imagine how badly say a very severe internet addict was put into a rehab clinic in the middle of fucking nowhere without even cellphone signal, nor tv or anything. . I don't think they would respond well.

It would probably take years for the individuals to get better cause they would have to be isolated completely from any sort of technology.
